Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory275.png'}
{3: 'City 045 West Warehouse, 03:41 a.m.'}

{3: 'Leaving the conservation area in City 043, they cross past several collapsed roads and buildings attacked by the Corrupted and Hetero-Creatures until finally arriving at their destination in City 045 five and a half hours later.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "Watanabe's situation isn't looking good either, but at least they promised to send a doctor and even offered to take in some refugees if the situation takes a turn for the worse. Thanks for letting me use your terminal.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Shrek terminates the call and hands the terminal back to Lee.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "You said you were going to call the Forsaken to send someone over, but you obviously didn't have a way of reaching them.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "I did just now, didn't I?", 4: '1'}
{3: "He points at Lee's terminal matter as if stating the obvious."}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "People need to rely on each other to survive in this world, so we can't just think about what we have. At a time like this, even more so.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He gestures to Lee, who gives him a dull look.'}
{2: 'Shrek', 3: "Want any more platitudes? I've got a hundred of 'em.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Just be more prepared next time before making promises.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Considering how many accidents we've had recently, what would you have done if you couldn't reach them?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: 'Nonsense. I trust you guys.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's fine, Lee. Doesn't matter whose terminal he uses as long as everything works out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'How are things with you, Liv?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I checked everyone's vitals and re-bandaged everyone's wounds that opened up from all the bumps along the way.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Sorry for writing in your book, Shrek...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'She returns the book titled "Comfort for the Soul" back to Shrek, now full of medical notes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "It's okay. Books are used for recording information. I've gotten what I need from it anyway.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I know I promised to make an identical rabbit doll for you, but...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Akane', 3: "It's okay... Miss Liv... I understand...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I only had time to make you a small one on the way here. If I return to City 043's conservation area, I'll make another one for you. Okay?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Akane', 3: 'Really?! THANKS!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "Alright, let's go back and get the other wounded.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "You're not going to tell us how you are doing?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Huh? You mean... my leg? I can manage...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "But what's with all the vital fluid?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I already re-bandaged it. I'm good to go.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "If you can't take it anymore, let me know. I'll carry you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Okay... Thank you, Lucia.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Oh, when is the Forsaken doctor going to be here?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "A day or so. We're not exactly close.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "If that's the case... You'll have to care for the wounded until then. I need to go back and escort the rest of the wounded.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shrek', 3: "Okay, I'll take it from here. You should get going.", 4: '1'}
